meanings.definition: A person who refuses to submit to an authority or to comply with a regulation.
meanings.sent1: The recusants in the group stood firm in their decision not to follow the rules.
meanings.sent2: The government imposed penalties on recusants who did not obey the new law.
meanings.sent3: The recusants at the meeting caused quite a stir with their rebellious attitude.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness made her a recusant in the eyes of the school administration.
meanings.sent5: The recusants' defiance was evident in their unwavering stance against the regulations.
